name: embezzler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who secretly takes money that is in their care or that belongs to an organization or business they work for: The detectives mistook him for a suspected embezzler. Businesses need to protect themselves from embezzlers. See
embezzle
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a convicted embezzler who later became an executive at a manufacturing company.All six of the embezzlers pleaded guilty and were fined. Embezzlers stole $1.9 million destined for two school districts.
